name: DeathMy-zombie survival simple game
description:
Control walking keys  > W-A-S-D

Fire > F

Don't forget! God is just watching you and you don't want the things you want to happen, it's just going to end up under the coffin.

Run away from zombies, try to kill them, but it will not be easy to increase your health. You are just a dream. But god is watching you.

Note: this is a simple game. The development process continues

You can contact eyuphanemekli@hotmail.com.
